text: Oldtown Covered Bridge, near Oldtown, Kentucky, was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1976. It is located east of Kentucky Route 1, south of Oldtown. It brings Frazer Branch Road 750 over the Little Sandy River. It is a two-span Burr truss bridge. With ==References== Category:Covered bridges in Kentucky Category:National Register of Historic Places in Greenup County, Kentucky
title: Oldtown Covered Bridge
